description: Detects suspicious windows strins in URI which could indicate possible exfiltration or webshell communication
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
false_positives: Legitimate application and websites that use windows paths in their URL
name: Suspicious Windows Strings In URI
query: cs-uri-query:(*\=C\:\/Users* OR *\=C\:\/Program%20Files* OR *\=C\:\/Windows* OR *\=C%3A%5CUsers* OR *\=C%3A%5CProgram%20Files* OR *\=C%3A%5CWindows*)
